title: Stickman's Halloween Adventure
content:
I don't think I posted this here yet. This is a movie I made last Halloween in 3D Movie Maker. It's about a plucky Stick figure superhero trying to become popular by throwing a Halloween party. The movie is only about four minutes long. Enjoy!

[url=http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=3911613823067895360]video.google.com/videopla...3067895360[/url][center]TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS[/center]

title: Re: Stickman's Halloween Adventure
content:
You haven't yet..

Haha, nice. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
